findings.title: BC - Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions by calling the `setBotBlacklist` function.

findings.title: OCTD - Owner Contract Tokens Drain
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to claim all the balance of the contract by calling the `withdrawAllToTreasury` function.

findings.title: FSA - Fixed Swap Address
findings.description: The swap address is assigned once in the constructor and cannot be changed, which may prevent the contract from catching up with future swap updates.

findings.title: MTS - Manipulate Total Supply
findings.description: The total supply increased proportional to the time that has elapsed since the contract creation, which can impact token price and Market Cap.

findings.title: CO - Code Optimization
findings.description: There are code segments that could be optimized to reduce size, memory consumption, and execution time.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: There are segments that contain unused state variables.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code elimination issue found in contract.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters. There are functions that have no event emitted, so it is difficult to track off-chain changes.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: There are variables that are defined in the local scope and are not initialized.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause loss of precision.
